tool_description: Tripadvisor API helps to query realtime  Hotels search, Flights prices, Restaurants, Attracting locations, etc to create a travelling site.
name: Tripadvisor
title: Tripadvisor

api_list.name: Search Cars Same DropOff

required_parameters.name: order
required_parameters.description: Order by parameter

required_parameters.name: pickUpDate
required_parameters.description:
PickUp Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: pickUpLocationType
required_parameters.description: **pickUpLocationType** can be retrieved from **Search Rental Cars Location** API from the **Rental Cars** collection.

required_parameters.name: pickUpTime
required_parameters.description:
PickUp Time
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: dropOffTime
required_parameters.description:
DropOff Time
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: dropOffDate
required_parameters.description:
DropOff Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: pickUpPlaceId
required_parameters.description: **placeId** for the **location** from where you want to **pick up** the car. **pickUpPlaceId** can be retrieved from **Search Rental Cars Location** API from the **Rental Cars** collection.

optional_parameters.name: driverAge
optional_parameters.description: Age of the Driver

optional_parameters.name: pickUpAirportCode
optional_parameters.description: Pass in the **airportCode** as **pickUpAirportCode** if the searched **place type** is **AIRPORT**.

optional_parameters.name: currencyCode
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number. The default page number is 1.

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.

required_parameters.name: dropOffPlaceId

required_parameters.name: dropOffLocationType
required_parameters.description: **dropOffLocationType** can be retrieved from **Search Rental Cars Location** API from the **Rental Cars** collection.

PickUp Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: pickUpPlaceId
required_parameters.description: **placeId** for the **location** from where you want to **pick up** the car. **pickUpPlaceId** can be retrieved from **Search Rental Cars Location** API from the **Rental Cars** collection.

PickUp Time

Checkin Date

required_parameters.description:
Checkin Date

required_parameters.name: checkOut

Checkout Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber

api_list.name: Search Location

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Name of the location where the **Hotel** is situated.

api_list.name: Get Hotel Details

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Pass in the hotel id as **id**, which can be retrieved from **Search Hotels** API from **Hotels** collection.

required_parameters.name: checkIn
required_parameters.description:
Checkin Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: checkOut
required_parameters.description:
CheckOut Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: Number of adult guests (with age 18 and over)

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: Number of rooms required.

optional_parameters.name: childrenAges
optional_parameters.description:
Number of children (with age between 0 and 17)
Example:
If 1st child's age is 11 months and 2nd child's age is 10 years, then the parameter should be passed as [0,10]

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

api_list.name: Search Hotels By Location

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Pass in the **geoId** of the location retrieved from the **Search Location** API from the **Hotels** collection.

required_parameters.name: checkIn
required_parameters.description:
Checkin Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: checkOut
required_parameters.description:
Checkout Date
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: Page number. The default page number is 1.

optional_parameters.name: currencyCode
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

api_list.name: Rental Rates

required_parameters.name: rentalId
required_parameters.description: Get **rentalId** from **Rental Search** API in **Vacation Rentals** collection.

required_parameters.name: startDate
required_parameters.description:
Checkin Date
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

required_parameters.name: adults
required_parameters.description: The number of guests.

required_parameters.name: endDate
required_parameters.description:
Checkout Date
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: currencyCode
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

api_list.name: Get Filters

required_parameters.name: destinationAirportCode
required_parameters.description: Destination **airportCode**. The **airportCode** can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: sourceAirportCode
required_parameters.description: Source **airportCode**. The **airportCode** can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
**Departure** or **Travel date**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: classOfService
required_parameters.description: Traveller cabin class.

required_parameters.name: itineraryType
required_parameters.description: Pass **itineraryType** as **ONE_WAY** for **one way** and **ROUND_TRIP** for **return flight**.

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
**Return date**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

api_list.name: Search Restaurants

required_parameters.name: locationId
required_parameters.description: **locationId** of the place got from **Search Restaurant Location** in **Restaurants collection**.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number. The default page number is 1.

api_list.name: Search Flights

required_parameters.name: numAdults
required_parameters.description:
Number of Adults (Ages between 18-64 years)
Default Value: 1

required_parameters.name: sortOrder
required_parameters.description: Sort by parameter

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
**Departure** or **Travel date**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

required_parameters.name: numSeniors
required_parameters.description:
Number of Seniors (with age 65 and over)
Default Value: 1

required_parameters.name: sourceAirportCode
required_parameters.description: Source **airportCode**. The **airportCode** can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: destinationAirportCode
required_parameters.description: Destination **airportCode**. The **airportCode** can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: classOfService
required_parameters.description: Traveller cabin class.

required_parameters.name: itineraryType
required_parameters.description: Pass **itineraryType** as **ONE_WAY** for **one way** and **ROUND_TRIP** for **return flight**.

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
**Return date**.
Format: **YYYY-MM-DD**

optional_parameters.name: childAges
optional_parameters.description:
Pass Children age in the form of Array (Ages between 2-12 years)
Eg: [2, 10]

optional_parameters.name: searchHash
optional_parameters.description: Pass **searchHash** from the previous API call to get a complete response.

optional_parameters.name: searchId
optional_parameters.description: Pass **searchId** from the previous API call to get a complete response.

optional_parameters.name: nearby
optional_parameters.description: Include nearby airports

optional_parameters.name: pageLoadUid
optional_parameters.description: Pass **pageLoadUid** from the previous API call to get a complete response.

optional_parameters.name: currencyCode
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

optional_parameters.name: nonstop
optional_parameters.description: Prefer nonstop

api_list.name: Search Rental Cars Location

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Name of the location where you want to Rent the Car.

api_list.name: Rental Details

required_parameters.name: rentalId
required_parameters.description: Get **rentalId** from **Rental Search** API in **Vacation Rentals** collection.

api_list.name: Search Flights MultiCity

required_parameters.name: sortOrder
required_parameters.description: Sort by parameter

required_parameters.name: classOfService
required_parameters.description: Traveller cabin class.

required_parameters.name: legs
required_parameters.description:
The legs must contain the origin, destination and date in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
{'sourceAirportCode':'BOS','destinationAirportCode':'LON','date':'2022-12-18'},{'sourceAirportCode':'LON','destinationAirportCode':'BOS','date':'2022-12-26'},
…
]
**Note**: If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects on the board.

optional_parameters.name: pageLoadUid
optional_parameters.description: Pass **pageLoadUid** from the previous API call to get a complete response.

optional_parameters.name: currencyCode
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

optional_parameters.name: searchId
optional_parameters.description: Pass **searchId** from the previous API call to get a complete response.

optional_parameters.name: searchHash
optional_parameters.description: Pass **searchHash** from the previous API call to get a complete response.

api_list.name: Get Currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tripadvisor16.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCurrency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tripadvisor16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tripadvisor16.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getCurrency"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tripadvisor16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

required_parameters.description:
Checkout Date

api_list.name: Get Cruises Details

required_parameters.description: **seoName** can be retrieved from **Search Cruises** API and **Get Cruises Quick Links** API from the **Cruises collection**.

required_parameters.name: shipId
required_parameters.description: **shipId** can be retrieved from **Search Cruises** API and **Get Cruises Quick Links** API from the **Cruises collection**.

optional_parameters.name: currencyCode
optional_parameters.description: **currencyCode** can be retrieved from **Get Currency** API from **Configs** collection.

optional_parameters.name: departureDate
optional_parameters.description:
Departure Date
Format: **YYYY-MM**

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Page number. The default page number is 1.

api_list.name: Get Cruises Quick Links
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tripadvisor16.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/cruises/getCruisesQuickLinks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tripadvisor16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
